name: The Floor is Lava (itch) (Adam)
description:
You somehow ended up in a deadly dungeon that is quickly filling up with lava. Escape!

This is a Duality Tilemaps Jam entry.

Source Code
  • Full project and source code is available on GitHub.
  • The attached download is game-only, no editor or code included.
Attribution
  • Graphics based on tilesets by Arachne (@agnesheyer)
  • Music made by Eric Matyas from http://soundimage.org/
  • Sfx based on some made by Eric Matyas, Erdie and cemagar on freesound.org
